title: Billing Code Drift: False Claims Exposure

dlr.decision: Suspend affected template; manual review queue; self-disclosure to CMS/OIG with corrective action plan
dlr.decided_by: Chief Financial Officer + Chief Compliance Officer + General Counsel

alternatives_rejected.description: Correct template only, defer disclosure pending internal audit
alternatives_rejected.rejection_reason: False Claims Act liability increases with delay; proactive disclosure reduces penalty exposure

rs.primary_reasoning: Proactive self-disclosure with corrective action demonstrates good faith; template correction prevents further accumulation
counter_claims: Revenue cycle director argued upcoding was template error not intent — accepted, but disclosure still required
Legal counsel confirmed self-disclosure to OIG is the defensible path

new_edges: Coding template change → automated CMS rule validation gate
Revenue anomaly > 20% variance → automatic compliance review trigger
